definition[0]: to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil
example[0]: Fry the potatoes, covered, for about 20 minutes.
definition[1]: to kill someone in an electric chair, or to be killed in an electric chair, as a punishment
explanation[0]: Fry belongs to a group of verbs where the same noun can be the subject of the verb or its object
explanation[1]: In this sentence, ‘some fish’ is the object of fry
explanation[2]: In this sentence, ‘some fish’ is the subject of fry
definition[2]: a long thin piece of potato that has been cooked in fat
